scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d db
scripts.dev:model: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "cd apps/model; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1) { . .venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1 }; uvicorn src.main:app --reload --port 8000"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n DB,MODEL,API,WEB -c auto "npm run dev:db" "npm run dev:model" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"
